DELETE FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCate WHERE RuleCode = #activityCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(Nvarchar,A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID) AS prmActGrp, A.ActivityCode AS activityCode, A.ActivityName AS prmActiveName, A.DescriptionDtl AS descriptionDtl, A.SendFlag AS sendFlag, A.BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(30),A.UpdateTime,121) AS updTime, A.ModifyCount AS modCount, A.NeedBuyFlag AS needBuyFlag, B.RuleCodeShort AS shortCode, B.RuleCond AS ruleCondJson, B.RuleResult AS ruleResultJson, B.RuleType AS ruleType, B.SubBrandCode AS subBrandCode, CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.StartTime,120) AS startTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR,B.EndTime,120) AS endTime, B.TimeJson AS timeJson, B.PlaceJson AS placeJson, B.PlaceType AS locationType, B.SearchCode AS searchCode, B.MemberType AS memberType, B.UseCoupon AS useCoupon, B.ZgqFlag AS zgqFlag, B.SubCampaignValid AS subCampValid, ISNULL(B.ExecFlag,'0') AS execFlag, ISNULL(B.IsMust,'0') AS isMust, ISNULL(B.Level,0) AS level, ISNULL(B.EnableMessage,'0') AS enMessage, ISNULL(B.EnableContinue,'1') AS enContinue, B.MaxExecCount AS maxExecCount, C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AS ruleID, D.ConditionInfo AS memberJson, CONVERT(NVARCHAR,D.RecordCount) AS memberCount, B.ExRanges AS exRanges FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule B ON(A.ActivityCode = B.RuleCode AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule C ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_SearchLog D ON(B.SearchCode = D.BIN_SearchCode AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = D.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_PromotionActivityID = #activeID#
SELECT A.RuleCode as ruleCode FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule A WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# and A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# and A.RuleCodeShort = #ruleCodeShort#
UPDATE Campaign.BIN_Campaign SET ValidFlag = '0' OUTPUT DELETED.BIN_CampaignID WHERE CampaignCode = 'AS' + #ruleCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule SET ValidFlag = '0' WHERE BIN_CampaignID = #campId#

DELETE A FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult A JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule B ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = B.BIN_CampaignRuleID) WHERE B.BIN_CampaignID = #campId#
DELETE A FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule B ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = B.BIN_CampaignRuleID) WHERE B.BIN_CampaignID = #campId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult( BIN_CampaignRuleID, BIN_ProductVendorID, BarCode, UnitCode, SaleType, Price, Quantity, ValidFlag ) SELECT #campRuleId#, A.BIN_ProductVendorID, A.PromotionPrtCode, A.PromotionPrtUnitcode, A.SaleType, A.Price, A.Quantity, A.ValidFlag FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity C ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityID) WHERE C.ActivityCode = #ruleCode# AND C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

INSERT INTO Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition( BIN_CampaignRuleID, BIN_CampaignBasePropID, BasePropValue1, BasePropValue2, ActLocationType, ValidFlag ) SELECT #campRuleId#, E.BIN_CampaignBasePropID, T.BasePropValue1, T.BasePropValue2, T.ActLocationType, '1' FROM ( SELECT case when D.PropertyName='baseProp_time' THEN 'baseProp_obtain_time' ELSE D.PropertyName END AS PropertyName, A.BasePropValue1, A.BasePropValue2, CASE WHEN A.ActLocationType = '5' THEN '0' WHEN A.ActLocationType = '6' THEN '5' ELSE A.ActLocationType END AS ActLocationType FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule B ON(A.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity C ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityID) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp D ON(A.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = D.BIN_PromotionBasePropID)
WHERE C.ActivityCode = #ruleCode# AND C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ) T JOIN [Campaign].[BIN_CampaignBaseProp] E ON(T.PropertyName = E.PropertyName)

INSERT INTO Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition( BIN_CampaignRuleID, BIN_CampaignBasePropID, BasePropValue1, ActLocationType, ValidFlag ) SELECT #campRuleId#, B.BIN_CampaignBasePropID, A.SearchCode, A.MemberType, '1' FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule A LEFT JOIN [Campaign].[BIN_CampaignBaseProp] B ON(B.PropertyName = 'baseProp_customer') WHERE A.RuleCode = #ruleCode# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
A.CounterCode AS code, A.CounterNameIF AS name
C.BIN_RegionID AS code, C.RegionNameChinese AS name
D.BIN_ChannelID AS code, D.ChannelName AS name
A.BelongFaction AS code
E.BIN_OrganizationID AS code, E.DepartName AS name
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege B WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.ValidFlag = 1 AND B.BIN_UserID=#userId#)
JOIN Basis.BIN_Region C WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_RegionID = C.BIN_RegionID AND C.ValidFlag = 1)
JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel D WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_ChannelID = D.BIN_ChannelID AND D.ValidFlag = 1)
JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (A.BIN_OrganizationID = E.BIN_OrganizationID AND E.ValidFlag = 1)
WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = 1

SELECT B.BasePropValue1 as code FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionBaseProp A JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition B ON(A.BIN_PromotionBasePropID = B.BIN_PromotionBasePropID AND B.ValidFlag =1) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule C ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID=C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = 1) WHERE A.ValidFlag = 1 AND A.PropertyName=#basePropName# AND C.BIN_PromotionActivityID=#activeID#
